description: Mentioned only by Locher in his entry for Principal; he says: I found, on a very good organ in Jersey, an open 16-ft. pedal stop, labelled Grand Open Pedal, which alone counterbalanced the three manuals. This stop resembles in size and power the corresponding pedal stop in the church of St. Laurence at St. Gallen. Bibliography Locher[1]: Principal. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only. GrandOpenPedal.html - Last updated 16 March 2000. Home Full Index
